publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2704 Dr Jean Turner: Public Debate on NHS in Holyrood—That the Parliament congratulates everyone who participated in the first-ever public debate in Holyrood on the future of Scotland’s National Health Service and recognises, especially, the contribution made by the staff of the Health Committee whose organisation contributed to making this an extremely successful event.
S2M-2704 Public Debate on NHS in Holyrood (lodged on 15 April 2005) John Swinburne*, Murdo Fraser*, Karen Gillon*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-2704 Public Debate on NHS in Holyrood (lodged on 15 April 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Fergus Ewing*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-2704 Public Debate on NHS in Holyrood (lodged on 15 April 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-2704 Public Debate on NHS in Holyrood (lodged on 15 April 2005) Frances Curran*
